message.content:
cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.SI, cs.IT, cs.DS 

Reasoning: The paper discusses a new approach to representing causal independence in belief networks, which is a topic that falls under the umbrella of artificial intelligence (cs.AI). The use of functional representation and nested decomposition of functions suggests a focus on machine learning (cs.LG) and statistical inference (cs.SI). The paper also mentions the efficiency of the proposed representation for inference, which could be of interest to researchers in information theory (cs.IT) and data structures (cs.DS).
